LanguageData.HorseshoesPin.label: horseshoes pin
LanguageData.HorseshoesPin.description: A simple ancient game played with a few horseshoes and a large pin in the ground. Players toss horseshoes from a distance and attempt to get them to land close to or around the pin. It's relaxing, and even trains hand-eye coordination.
LanguageData.ChessTable.label: chess table
LanguageData.ChessTable.description: The ancient game of kings. Fun for a few hours here and there, even playing alone.
LanguageData.BilliardsTable.label: billiards table
LanguageData.BilliardsTable.description: A soft-topped bounded table for playing a variety of billiards-type games.
LanguageData.Television.label: television
LanguageData.Television.description: A cathode ray tube display for showing moving pictures with sound. Even on the rimworlds, there is often an old transmitter running something at least marginally interesting.
LanguageData.Telescope.label: telescope
LanguageData.Telescope.description: A telescope for doing amateur astronomy. It's a relaxing and fun hobby for a certain kind of person.
